text: (us vakt usaka anjaam) bata doonga ai beta isamen shak nahin ki vah amal (achchha ho ya bura) agar raee ke baraabar bhee ho aur phir vah kisee sakht patthar ke andar ya aasamaan mein ya zameen me (chhupa hua) ho to bhee khuda use (qayaamat ke din) haazir kar dega beshak khuda bada baareekabeen vaaqiphakaar hai
